website_summaries.verdict: A low power ATV that is suitable for the littlest riders and doesn't go very fast.
pros: Max speed 2.5 mph, which is good for little ones
Buttons for engine sound and horn sound
cons: This is a rather small model of youth ATV
Your children will outgrow it quickly

customer_reviews.title: That item would operate as intended
customer_reviews.text: Received the item, rear axle was missing. Contacted mfg and they immediately sent replacement. Then completed assembly and item wa inoperable due to what seem to be bad battery. Mfg sent me another battery and has excellent CS. Unit is still inoperable. Returned to Amazon for refund. Disappointed as this was to be my Grandson BD present which has come and gone. For $140.00 item should be tested before shipment as operable.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie J Ezell

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old son loves it. He’s been riding it outside in the gravel and drives great!
customer_reviews.author: Valeri

customer_reviews.title: Motion didn't work, right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Imagine the dismay of your child, opening and attempting to ride this toy, on Christmas day, when the toy doesn't work. Sure, the lights come on, but it doesn't move forward or backward. Good thing I opened it and tested this functionality, with enough time to order a new, different item, before Christmas. Never going to recommend KidTrax to anyone ... and a little sour at CAT for licensing their name to such a shoddy product.
customer_reviews.author: Concord, ma

customer_reviews.title: 2 year old son LUVs it!
customer_reviews.text: We got this because it was really reasonable considering some of the childrens cars are in the 3-400 dollar price range. By then they may as well get a childrens ATV! So this was a bargain find in my opinion. My almost 2 year old son drives it around and his little legs reach the gas pedal just fine. HOWEVER it is hardy enough for my older 9 year old to ride around although it is NOT for older children nor would I recommend it be purchased for anyone out of the recommended age range.
customer_reviews.author: Insight

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: I saw some of the reviews, but I still took the chance anyway that this would be a good option for my 2-year-old grandson's birthday. It seemed to work for some and not for others. It stopped working one week after buying it!! TERRIBLE product!!! Spend your money on something that won't disappoint your toddler after only a week!
customer_reviews.author: karent

customer_reviews.title: JUNK***JUNK***JUNK***
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Do not buy. I purchased this fir my 2 year old who loved it...at first. It worked well for two days. Then it wouldn’t hold a charge and stopped working completely. I tried contacting the company but they have not been helpful. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy J.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made but fun ride on toy for the lil ones.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this used advertised like new, had broke wire upon being shipped to me and overlooked at Amazon warehouse . I FIXED myself so no regret and item did arrive upon stated shipping time. I PURCHASED FOR MY ACTIVE TODDLER and once he seen it I couldn't break his heart by returning toy. Be aware of misleading ads and cheap plastic but not a total loss rode the item for hr. SON DOES LOVE.
customer_reviews.author: John Mac

customer_reviews.title: It lasted 8 months!
customer_reviews.text: It lasted only 8 months, now the motor is dead, and it will only ride in reverse! I took it apart, checked the wires and it won’t work now. Santa made Christmas morning with this gift! Powerful battery and lights. My son is flying around the house in it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery and charging
customer_reviews.text: We have had several different battery ride in toys. This one is not very well made. We have probably only charged it about 5 times that we have actually been able to get it to work. There is no charge light indicator. We plug it it for hours and it still will do nothing. It has been used very little because it hasn’t worked well since a month after we bought it. I will not buy this brand again
customer_reviews.author: Danyell

customer_reviews.title: Stopped going forward in not even 24 hrs!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son last week. We finally got to putting it together yesterday and he loved it. Went to use it today and it will not go forward, only reverse will work. He keeps climbing on saying go go then getting really upset that it won't go. We're extremely dissatisfied and disappointed. No one wants to see their 2 year old upset. I am trying to contact the company and will update my review as needed.
customer_reviews.author: angie

customer_reviews.title: Great rider for my almost 3 year old!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this 4 wheeler! He’s 2 1/2 and caught On quick to steering and holding the peddle. We misplaced the charging cord, so I’ll need to find out how to order a new one. He got it for Christmas and it just ran out of battery juice a few days ago. My brother put it together and said it was pretty easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Neff

customer_reviews.title: bad customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 4 wheeler for my grandson and sadly it stopped working 2 wks after I purchased it . My husband called the manufacturer and they sent a new part out , (wires ),,with no instructions on how to replace it, and now we have been trying to call the manufacture several times and we are getting the run around bad customer service, and I have a 4 wheeler that doesn't work, worst purchase on Amazon !!!
customer_reviews.author: regina reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working 2 months after purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working 2 months after purchasing. Called customer care which were nice enough to send out new wires but it did not fix the issue. My son is sad that he can no longer play with his “monster truck” as he calls it. It’s now sitting in the garage just taking up space, very disappointed in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michi

customer_reviews.title: missing parts
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for my sons 3rd birthday, were putting it together the night before, and it was completely missing pieces in the back that the back wheels attach to. We were really disappointed. We ended up running out the day of and finding another gift last minute, and returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Based on some of the negative reviews I had read, this was way easier to assemble than some of the reviews had lead me to believe. It took my husband and I 30 minutes to put together. My children love it and its pretty light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Torrence

customer_reviews.title: Great birthday gift!
customer_reviews.text: This was a fantastic birthday gift for our 3 year old. Battery lasts about 2 miles up and down hills and through grass. The tires can handle a one inch dip in curbs or dips in neighborhood side walks. Only complaint is that the power could be a little better in grass and up hills, but overall a great buy and gift. Our little guy loves riding this four wheeler.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry W.

customer_reviews.title: This is a really really nice kids quad
customer_reviews.text: This is a really really nice kids quad, the only thing that could make it better is if two wheels had power going to them instead of only one, gets stuck in some places in the yard it really shouldnt because of that, otherwise super cool
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This gift made my 3year old grandson's XMAS!!
customer_reviews.text: I had read some review that this ATV toy didn't work well in grass, but it did in my yard! My 3-year old grandson covered every inch of my backyard many times over, and figured out all the controls very quickly! He was in heaven and did not want to come inside even for dinner. The battery never showed signs of slowing down the entire day, which made us all very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Cool toy!
customer_reviews.text: This is cool. Drives on one wheels power but still grreat for 2-4 years old. Cool sounds and kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Not a big deal but for the money you pay it would be nice to have something not broken
customer_reviews.text: Plastic underneath came broken. Not a big deal but for the money you pay it would be nice to have something not broken.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mackin

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our grandson for Christmas. He was so excited. He rode it for about 3 hrs. Nonstop. Would not even open other gifts. 3 hrs later it stopped working. Foot pedal feed has loose wire that keeps spoiling. I am past return deadline. Very sad 2 yr old. He just keeps pointing and saying broke. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Jandreau

customer_reviews.title: Great for 3year olds!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 3 year old grandson and he loves it! Fits him perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Rae jean Langley

customer_reviews.title: Well priced
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad ATV. The only issue I have is only one rear wheel spins.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: quick to put together
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a Christmas present for my youngest grandbaby. After reading the reviews of how hard it was to put together I was worried but it came today and I put it together myself in about 30 min. Made this Grammy very relieved and happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Alison Green

customer_reviews.title: Not terrible but not great
customer_reviews.text: Still going , forward switch had a loose connection but after I fixed that I cant believe it's still working over a year later, it's slow 1 wheel drive but the 2 year old loves it
customer_reviews.author: Erik Reece

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME OR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Package came before the due date which was great, however, the battery does not charge. I am still waiting on the replacement battery. Customer service gives you the run around in getting replacement.
customer_reviews.author: debbie n

customer_reviews.title: Not working
customer_reviews.text: This will be the first time using this since we purchased in winter and after a couple weeks it does not work Battery charged , sounds work but does not go
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaddict

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: Lasted about 30 days before the switches went bad and no longer worked.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as the picture and description said. Easy to put together and our grandson loves it! The battery lasts a long time! Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The battery was dead
customer_reviews.text: The ride on arrived late after Christmas. Everything is fine except the battery is dead. Disappointed after waiting so long and he still can’t ride it.
customer_reviews.author: Jade Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend
customer_reviews.text: Used three times before it simply wouldn't work. Returned it. Don't recommend this item AT ALL.
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: Need all the parts.
customer_reviews.text: I was missing a bushing in 1 of the tires. The other 3 were packaged with the tires. I am going to need another 1.
customer_reviews.author: marjorie

customer_reviews.title: Stop going forward in less than a month.  Would like it replaced!!
customer_reviews.text: My 3-year-old grandson loves it, but it stopped going forward within a month. Would like it fixed or replaced and try again. We also never received the boulders and hard hat.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Does not work!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my grandson birthday and will not charge. What a horrible day for him..
customer_reviews.author: janet evenson

customer_reviews.title: Battery doesn’t hold charge
customer_reviews.text: Had this for just over a month and battery won’t charge, and will not turn on what so ever. Worked good for a while now, nothing. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsey M.

customer_reviews.title: Love this item
customer_reviews.text: This item was not hard at all to put together my 3 year old loves it do not listen to the bad reviews this was a great item to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item, but not good for grass or rocks
customer_reviews.text: Item is great for child age 2-4 years of age. Item do not operate well on grass or rocks.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you get what you ordered
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the the kid trax and received this spiderman 3 wheeler. I am so upset
customer_reviews.author: April  Heikkinen

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Nephew loves it! I’m pretty much the best aunt for getting this for him for Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Unplug charger from wall when not in use.
customer_reviews.text: A two year old loves this! Can’t keep him off it.
customer_reviews.author: David Atchison

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and well made
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our gran-daughter last Christmas, and it has worked flawlessly since then. The assembly instructions were well done and made it easy. Having assembled a similar unit from another company for my grandson, I have to say that this item is much better in quality and documentation. Well worth the price, and it works great. A full charge seems to last for at least an hour or more of continuous use.
customer_reviews.author: tommytrekr

customer_reviews.title: HE ABSOLUTELY LOVES IT
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 yr old grandson. He absolutely loves it. He’s learning that he needs to lift his foot to stop. We go for walks in the woods with it. I’m happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor product
customer_reviews.text: It never did work. The company even sent a new battery and charging cord. Still never worked. Had to throw it away. What a waste!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fire!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this just over 4 months. Last night it burst into flames in our garage. Thank goodness my husband just happened to be going out and saw it.
customer_reviews.author: Janell Hassell

customer_reviews.title: Great for a beginner and good value for your money.
customer_reviews.text: Great for a child 3-4, maybe 5 years old. The size of the vehicle is not very big, but it’s definitely comfortable for my son and quite easy to manage. Bright color and detailed unique design. One speed and the option to go forward and reverse. Perfect for a beginner rider! Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: NATALYA C.

customer_reviews.title: Battery stopped working 6 months in
customer_reviews.text: Our son loves this quad. Not as fast as we would have liked, but he still loves! ***not even 6 months in, the battery will not charge and it doesn’t work now** not very happy!!
customer_reviews.author: MomaBearOf3

customer_reviews.title: FALSE ADVERTISING
customer_reviews.text: Advertised as including CAT helmet, boulders, & seat belt. All were omitted. Manufacturer says ATV does not include these items. The seatbelt would be a safety issue if the ATV tipped over. As this is a Christmas gift, will right review on product later. Issue is with Amazon's misrepresentation.
customer_reviews.author: Rolanda

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts & Late
customer_reviews.text: Late, missing parts, stickers wrinkled, stickers were scuffed, and did I mention LATE!
customer_reviews.author: Dee Kirby

product_meta.title: Kid Trax Caterpillar ATV Toddler Ride On Toy, 6 Volt Battery, 3-5 Years, Max Rider Weight of 60 lbs, Single Rider, CAT ATV
product_meta.description: Get ready for countless hours of driveway fun with the 6-volt CAT power ATV ride-on from Kid Trax! Little aspiring construction workers will love this sporty battery-powered set of wheels that's the perfect compromise between fun riding, sweet style, and parent-approved safety. It all starts with the lifelike driving experience: real foot pedal acceleration, working LED headlights and realistic horn and engine noises take playtime to a whole new level. You can rest easy knowing this one seater tops out at 2. 5 mph and features Power Trax rubber traction strip tires to smooth out the ride. As an added bonus, little drivers can go in both forward and reverse for tricky turnarounds in cramped spaces. And the fun doesn't have to stop there! Thanks to the included 6-volt rechargeable battery and wall charger there will never be a dull moment. The ride-on is designed for riders between the ages 3 and 5 with a maximum rider weight of 60 lbs. Good times await on the 6-volt CAT power ATV from Kid Trax! One Step Direct Connect Charging System for easy, no-fuss charging
feature_bullets: Join the construction crew with the CAT ATV 6V Battery-Powered Ride-On Toy from Kid Trax.
Capable of a forward speed of 2.5 MPH, this ride-on toy ATV lives up to the heavy-machinery legend of Caterpillar bulldozers.
Features such as Kid Trax Power Trax rubber traction strip tires for all-terrain performance and an included seatbelt make this toy adventurous, yet safe.
A 6V rechargeable battery with Kid Trax direct connect one-step charging system guarantees that fun is never more than an outlet away.

This ride-on toy ships with a CAT hard hat and boulders, comes unassembled, has a 60-pound maximum weight capacity, is recommended for ages three to five years, and has a 1 year limited warranty, with a 6 month limited warranty on the battery.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars140 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
